There is a multitude of beautiful and historical architecture to see in that area if you are willing to get out of your car. Many state and local residents have worked long and hard to have the Colt area designated as a National Park. This is a slap in the face to a city that is trying to restore some remnants of it's former glory. Take the tour - learn a little history and have an appreciation for some of the treasures in our own back yard.
